channel.title: S3 Policy :: Internship Report
channel.description: STAGE 4: S3 PERMITS (POLICY) CloudFront needs a “permission” to pull files from your 2 closed buckets. In CloudFront > Origins tab. Select Origin Singapore > Edit > Copy policy. Open a new tab > S3 Console > Bucket sgutodolist-frontend-sg. Permissions tab > Bucket Policy > Edit > Paste > Save. Repeat with Bucket Virginia:
